pkgmetadata.longdescription: Assignment of Haplotypes Based on SNP Dosages in Diploids and Polyploids // Infer the genetic composition of individuals in terms of haplotype dosages for a haploblock, based on bi- allelic marker dosages, for any ploidy level. Reference: Voorrips and Tumino: PolyHaplotyper: haplotyping in polyploids based on bi-allelic marker dosage data. Submitted to BMC Bioinformatics (2021).
